Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2007 10:43PM terrya wrote: Many thanks Iodine....Seeing that this is just "Prelim", is the correct protocol, to release this result to patient?
Posts.Title: Meaning of Preliminary Pathology Results? terrya iodine

Posts.Content: terrya wrote: My sister has had a needle biopsy on both breast...for suspicious calcifications.  The procedure was done on Wednesday of last week. Today, Monday morning, the office said 'preliminary' results show no sign of cancer, but that this is not final.  What does this mean? Are preliminary results a pathology report?  The wait for results have been very exhausting for us all.  Any help would be gratefuly appreciated. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Meaning of Preliminary Pathology Results? terrya iodine
